bookTitle: Little Women, Little Men, Jo's Boys
Plot: Little Women, Good Wives, Little Men and Jo's Boys are a series of novels by American author Louisa May Alcott (1832-1888). The books are loosely based on the author's childhood experiences with her three sisters. The novels are classics - the publisher unable to keep up with the demand when the first book in the series was published. Themes of romance, family drama, gender constraints and the validation of virtue over wealth are explored in these timeless stories.
Characters: Marmee, Meg March, Beth March, Amy March, Laurie Laurence, Mr. Laurence, Professor Bhaer, Rob Bhaer, Teddy Bhaer, Daisy Brooke, Demi Brooke, Mr. March, Aunt March, John Brooke, Jo March
